name: unfaithfulness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of having a sexual relationship or experience with a person who is not your husband, wife, or usual sexual partner: His sister accused their father of adultery and unfaithfulness. Many people discover that their partner's unfaithfulness leaves them feeling deeply betrayed. See
unfaithful
More examplesFewer examplesHe was utterly ignorant of his wife's unfaithfulness."I will not accept unfaithfulness in marriage," she says firmly.She found it difficult to forgive his unfaithfulness.
